mcq.statement: What was the title of Allama Iqbal's PhD thesis?

options.a: The Reconstruction of Religious Thought in Islam
options.b: The Development of Metaphysics in Persia

mcq.one_liner: Allama Iqbal's PhD thesis was titled **The Development of Metaphysics in Persia**.

suggestions.topic: Services of Sir Syed Ahmad Khan (1817-1898)
